name: Separated by Time
description:
Separated by Time was created for the 2022 Austin Global Game Jam and won an award for Captivating Story or Narrative. The game sees you switching between the past and future to solve puzzles across space and time. Guided by your great-grandson, will you save the world from utter destruction?

Credits

Producer: Baylee Redding

Co-Producer, Lead Artist: Alex Spector

Lead Programmer, Game Design: Joshua Standridge 

UI/UX, Programming, Level Design: Noah Carrico

Head Writer, Narrative Design, Audio Design: Trent Fowler

Programming, QA: Matt Stoltz

Artist: Lily Perkins

Character/UI Art, Game Design, Environmental Art: Jarrod Tomasic 

Feel free to leave feedback in the comments.
